glossary.definition: A system identity for an individual with login credentials and access permissions
A collection of personal and professional information about a user
An action performed on multiple users simultaneously (import, export, update)
The current state of a user account (active, inactive, suspended, terminated)

business_rules: User accounts must have unique email addresses
User profiles must contain required fields (name, email, etc.)
User account creation requires email verification
User status changes must be logged and auditable
Bulk operations must validate data before execution
User accounts can be deactivated but not deleted (soft delete)
Personal information must comply with privacy regulations
Bulk imports must handle errors and provide detailed reports
User search must respect privacy and access controls
invariants: User email must be unique within the system
User account must have valid status
User profile must have required fields
User account cannot be deleted if has active associations
Bulk operation must target valid users
edge_cases: User account is created with duplicate email - system detects duplicate, prevents creation, suggests password reset
Bulk import contains invalid data - system validates, imports valid records, reports errors for invalid records
User profile update conflicts with existing data - system detects conflict, requires resolution or override
User account is deactivated while has active sessions - system terminates sessions, logs deactivation
Bulk operation fails mid-execution - system rolls back or continues based on policy, reports partial success
User requests data deletion (GDPR) - system handles deletion request, maintains audit trail, removes personal data
User profile has missing required fields - system flags incomplete profile, prevents certain operations
User account is transferred between tenants - system handles transfer, maintains history, updates associations
compliance_requirements: User data must comply with GDPR and privacy regulations
User account access must be logged for security auditing
Personal information must be encrypted and access-controlled
User data retention must comply with legal requirements
Bulk operations must be auditable and traceable

inputs: User profile data (name, personal info, preferences)

user_journeys: Admin creates user account - provides email and initial info, account is created, verification email is sent
User completes profile - fills required and optional fields, profile is saved and validated
Admin performs bulk user import - uploads file, system validates and imports, provides detailed report
User updates profile - modifies information, changes are saved, history is maintained
Admin deactivates user account - account is deactivated, sessions are terminated, user is notified
acceptance_criteria_suggestions: Given user account creation, when email is unique and valid, then account is created and verification email is sent
Given profile update, when fields are valid, then profile is updated and history is maintained
Given bulk import, when data is valid, then users are imported and detailed report is provided
Given user deactivation, when account is active, then account is deactivated and sessions are terminated
Given GDPR deletion request, when request is valid, then personal data is deleted and audit trail is maintained
open_questions: What are the required profile fields? (name? email? phone? address?)
How are bulk imports validated? (pre-validation? post-validation? both?)
What is the user account lifecycle? (creation? activation? deactivation? deletion?)
How are user profile conflicts resolved? (last write wins? merge? manual resolution?)
What is the process for user account transfers? (between tenants? between systems?)
How are user search results filtered? (by permissions? by privacy settings?)
assumptions: User accounts require unique email addresses
User profiles contain personal and professional information
Bulk operations support CSV, Excel, and JSON formats
User accounts use soft delete (deactivation, not hard deletion)
User data must comply with privacy regulations
